channel.title: Comments on: General Update
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Rabbi Yaakov Feldman
item.dc:creator: Rabbi Yaakov Feldman
item.description: Ooh. You're cookin', Rabbi. I've learned R' Morgenstern's comments on the Kamarna and found them to be wonderful. I've become a fan of his (not a Chassid). I've long been a fan of R' Ashlag and have done my share of work on him, and have admired the Breslover for decades. I look forward to all your entries.
item.content:encoded: Ooh. You’re cookin’, Rabbi. I’ve learned R’ Morgenstern’s comments on the Kamarna and found them to be wonderful. I’ve become a fan of his (not a Chassid). I’ve long been a fan of R’ Ashlag and have done my share of work on him, and have admired the Breslover for decades. I look forward to all your entries.
